description:
11.148 limiter
Limits the pixel components values to the specified range [min, max].

The filter accepts the following options:
name: limiter

options.description: Lower bound. Defaults to the lowest allowed value for the input.
options.name: min

options.description: Upper bound. Defaults to the highest allowed value for the input.
options.name: max

options.description: Specify which planes will be processed. Defaults to all available.
options.name: planes
